title: Life Goes On
description: Along lifes journey, its the memories we collect that make it all worthwhile. In Elizabeth Riggins Life Goes On, she shares her history in a unique waythrough short stories and poems. Her delightful collection takes readers through the ups and downs of being a parent, with stories ranging from fun moments with her children in Italy to more serious times when one daughter runs away. She also provides readers with lighthearted tales and beautiful poetry that convey the human experience. Her vivid portrayal of events will make readers feel as if they are in her shoes, experiencing the good and the bad. Through this book, readers will be inspired and motivated, truly believing that Life Goes On.
author: Elizabeth Riggin
